item.title: Docker Commands
item.author: antonioplacerda@gmail.com (Antonio P. Lacerda)
item.description: This is a list of every docker command I find useful and a bit of info about it. It is not intended to be a tutorial of any kind, but maybe someone will find this list as useful as I consider it to be! General docker version - if any error here, docker is probably not running. If on linux, do a sudo docker info - a lot more info about the docker installation Containers docker container run IMAGE - first it gets an image from local machine, if it doesnâ€™t find one, tries to get one from docker hub.
